title: Looking for a team
body:
Hi , 
 I'm looking for a team to grow up in rank starting next season ( January 8 ) .

I used to play in Europe and I was stuck in gold there , but now my new account and place of living is in NA so my account is freshly new with only 26 champions and I finished last season in Silver 4 .

In Europe I was playing only support  , but now I'm playing Mid lane , because it was hard to leave the bronze here without playing some other role. Anyway would love to play support or mid with some friendly team ! 

Thank you ! {{sticker:galio-happy}}
